name: 登录反向用例

statusDetails.message:
AssertionError: assert '账号或密码错误' == '用户信息不存在'
  - 用户信息不存在
  + 账号或密码错误
statusDetails.trace:
self = data = {'case_name': '登录反向用例', 'data': {'passport': 'driver1', 'password': 'g71234567'}, 'expect': {'data': [], 'msg': '用户信息不存在', 'status': 500}, 'path': '/ucenter/user/login', ...} @pytest.mark.parametrize("data", test_data) def test_login(self, data): response = requests.post(url=url, data=json.dumps(data["data"]), headers=get_headers()).json() desc = "请求url: {}
" \ "请求类型：{}
" \ "期望结果：{}
" \ "实际结果：{}".format(url, data["type"], data["expect"], response) # allure.dynamic.story(data["case_name"]) allure.dynamic.title(data["case_name"]) allure.dynamic.description_html(desc) > assert response["msg"] == data["expect"]["msg"] E AssertionError: assert '账号或密码错误' == '用户信息不存在' E - 用户信息不存在 E + 账号或密码错误 testcase/test_login.py:28: AssertionError
